name: Battle of Klovia
description:
This is a classic arcade-style top-down space shooter. Kill everything! Don't die! The game is simple and fun.

A GAME CONTROLLER IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! You can play without a game controller, but it is not recommended. Keyboard control of the ship is... weird.

http://supergreengames.com

All art assets in this game are by Kenney.
Music by Eric Matyas.
